name: interactive-crown-mural
description: Interactive crown mural with 436 regions using Canvas ID-map

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run copy:static && npm run process:masks
scripts.copy:static: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp -r src/assets dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.process:masks: python3 mask_to_web.py --masks shape_masks --base coloured_regions.png --output dist/web_data --format canvas
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run dev

notes.approach: Canvas with ID-map for O(1) hit detection
